description: This Python source file defines dependencies for a FastAPI-based web application, including functions to obtain database sessions and authenticate users via JWT tokens.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Model representing the user entity, used for querying and returning user information.

methods.name: Session get_db_session()
methods.description: Returns a placeholder to indicate usage of the database session dependency; raises RuntimeError if invoked directly.

methods.name: User get_current_user( token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Authenticates the user based on JWT token and retrieves the user object from the database.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.signature: ( token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
